title: Nelli Kim
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Jacques Bobet and Georges Dufaux
brief_description: Member of the Soviet Union’s women’s gymnastic team at the 1976 Olympic Games, Nelli Kim was 17 when she won two gold medals for her superb performance on the horse vault and for the floor exercises. The slow-motion camera highlights the best moments of her performance.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Jacques Bobet and Georges Dufaux
